Ornn (Space Groove Ornn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: March 18, 2021

Space Groove Ornn is a cosmic-themed skin for the champion Ornn in the popular online game League of Legends. Released on March 18, 2021, this skin brings a vibrant and otherworldly look to the blacksmith deity of the Freljord. With its unique visual effects, animations, and sound effects, Space Groove Ornn offers players a fresh and exciting way to experience the champion.

Costume Details

Space Groove Ornn transforms the stoic blacksmith into a cosmic entity, adorned with vibrant colors and celestial patterns. His armor is replaced with a sleek, futuristic suit that glows with cosmic energy. The skin features a helmet with a translucent visor, revealing Ornn's glowing eyes and a starry sky within. His hammer is also given a cosmic makeover, with glowing energy pulsating through it.

The visual effects of Space Groove Ornn are truly mesmerizing. His abilities are enhanced with cosmic energy, leaving trails of stardust and colorful particles in his wake. When using his ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, Ornn summons a massive cosmic ram that crashes down on his enemies, leaving behind a trail of sparkling stardust.

Furthermore, Space Groove Ornn's sound effects perfectly complement the cosmic theme. His abilities are accompanied by futuristic and otherworldly sounds, adding to the immersive experience. The skin also features a unique recall animation, where Ornn is teleported into a cosmic portal before reappearing in a burst of stardust.

Ornn's Story

Ornn, also known as the Fire below the Mountain, is a powerful demigod and a revered figure in the Freljord. He is the patron of blacksmiths and craftsmen, known for his exceptional skill in forging legendary weapons and artifacts. Ornn is a stoic and solitary figure, rarely interacting with mortals unless absolutely necessary.

In the game, Ornn is a tanky top lane champion with a focus on durability and crowd control. His passive ability, Living Forge, allows him to upgrade certain items for himself and his teammates, granting them additional stats. Ornn's abilities revolve around his hammer, which he uses to unleash devastating attacks and control the battlefield.

Ornn's strengths lie in his ability to soak up damage and initiate team fights. With his high base stats and crowd control abilities, he excels at engaging enemies and disrupting their plans. His ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, is a game-changer, as it can knock up multiple enemies and set up opportunities for his team to secure kills.

However, Ornn also has weaknesses that players must be aware of. His early game can be challenging, as he lacks mobility and can struggle against aggressive laners. Additionally, his abilities have long cooldowns, making it crucial for players to time their engages and disengages effectively. Ornn's reliance on his team to follow up on his initiations can also be a double-edged sword, as poor coordination can lead to missed opportunities.

Despite his solitary nature, Ornn plays a significant role in the lore of League of Legends. He is deeply connected to the Freljord and its history, and his actions have shaped the world in profound ways. Ornn's presence in the game adds depth to the narrative and offers players a chance to embody a powerful and enigmatic deity.

On this page, you can find information and videos showcasing all of Ornn's appearances, including the Space Groove Ornn skin. Whether you're a fan of his cosmic transformation or simply curious about his abilities and lore, this page is your go-to resource for all things Ornn.

Ornn (Elderwood Ornn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP | Release Date: September 23, 2021

Ornn, the Freljordian demigod of the forge, has long been a formidable presence on the Rift. With his mighty hammer and mastery over fire and metal, he has forged countless weapons and armor for his allies. But now, Ornn ventures into the mystical realm of the Elderwood, donning a new skin that embodies the ancient and ethereal power of nature. Introducing Elderwood Ornn, a skin that brings a touch of enchantment to this mighty blacksmith.

Elderwood Ornn is a visually stunning skin that transforms Ornn into a majestic guardian of the forest. His armor is adorned with intricate wooden carvings and glowing magical runes, giving him an otherworldly appearance. The skin features vibrant green and brown hues, blending seamlessly with the natural surroundings of the Elderwood. Ornn's hammer is also given a mystical makeover, with swirling leaves and vines entwined around its handle.

One of the standout features of Elderwood Ornn is his ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God. When Ornn activates his ultimate, a massive tree erupts from the ground, sending out roots that entangle and stun enemies in its path. The visual effects of this ability are truly breathtaking, with leaves and petals swirling around the tree as it rises. It's a sight to behold and adds an extra layer of awe to Ornn's already powerful ultimate.

But the beauty of Elderwood Ornn is not just skin deep. The skin also comes with new sound effects that further enhance the immersive experience. From the gentle rustling of leaves as Ornn moves to the resonating thud of his hammer strikes, every sound is carefully crafted to transport players into the enchanting world of the Elderwood.

Now, let's take a moment to delve into the lore and story of Ornn. As one of the ancient Freljordian demigods, Ornn has a rich history within the League of Legends universe. He is known as the Fire Below the Mountain, a stoic and solitary figure who spends his days crafting powerful weapons and armor in his hidden forge. Ornn's creations are said to be unmatched in their durability and strength, and many warriors seek out his services to gain an edge in battle.

However, Ornn's true passion lies in the act of creation itself. He takes great pride in his work and is driven by a desire to perfect his craft. This dedication to his art often leads him to seclude himself from the world, but when the need arises, Ornn will emerge from his forge to defend the Freljord and its people.

In the game, Ornn is a tanky top laner who excels at soaking up damage and initiating team fights. His passive ability, Living Forge, allows him to upgrade his allies' items for free, giving his team a significant advantage in the late game. Ornn's Q ability, Volcanic Rupture, creates a line of fire that damages and slows enemies, while his W ability, Bellows Breath, grants him a shield and deals damage in a cone in front of him.

Ornn's E ability, Searing Charge, allows him to dash forward and knock up enemies in his path, making it a powerful engage tool. And as mentioned earlier, his ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, sends out a massive shockwave that knocks up enemies and summons a colossal ram to charge forward, dealing damage and knocking up anyone in its way.

With his tankiness, crowd control, and ability to upgrade items, Ornn is a valuable asset to any team composition. He can initiate fights, protect his carries, and provide utility through his item upgrades. However, Ornn does have some weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he lacks mobility and can struggle against aggressive laners. Additionally, his abilities have long cooldowns, so timing and resource management are crucial when playing Ornn.

Overall, Ornn is a champion with a unique playstyle and a rich lore that adds depth to the League of Legends universe. Whether you're a fan of his powerful blacksmith persona or the mystical allure of Elderwood Ornn, this champion is sure to leave a lasting impression.

For more information about Ornn and his various appearances, including Elderwood Ornn, be sure to check out the League of Legends website and official YouTube channel. Explore the world of Runeterra and discover the stories behind your favorite champions.

Ornn: The Fire Below the Mountain

Release Date: August 23, 2017

Ornn, the Fire Below the Mountain, is a powerful and ancient demigod in the world of League of Legends. With his immense strength and mastery over fire and metal, Ornn is a formidable tank and a force to be reckoned with on the battlefield. In this article, we will delve into Ornn's captivating story, explore his strengths and weaknesses, and discuss his significance in the game.

The Legend of Ornn

Ornn's tale is one of ancient power and unwavering determination. Born in the Freljord, a harsh and unforgiving land, Ornn was one of the first beings to emerge from the primordial elements. He is the brother of Volibear, another powerful demigod, and the two share a deep bond despite their differing personalities.

Ornn's affinity for fire and metal is unparalleled. He is a master blacksmith, capable of forging weapons and armor of incredible strength and durability. Legends speak of his creations being imbued with the very essence of the elements, making them nearly indestructible.

However, Ornn's true power lies in his ability to shape the land itself. He can summon molten lava, causing the earth to tremble beneath his enemies' feet. His fiery breath can melt even the sturdiest of defenses, and his mighty hammer strikes with the force of a raging inferno.

Strengths and Weaknesses

Ornn's strengths lie in his exceptional durability and crowd control abilities. As a tank, he can soak up immense amounts of damage while disrupting the enemy team. His passive ability, Living Forge, allows him to upgrade his own items and those of his allies, granting them additional stats and unique effects. This makes Ornn a valuable asset in team fights, as he can enhance his team's overall power.

Furthermore, Ornn's ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, is a game-changer. He summons a massive elemental ram that charges forward, knocking up and damaging any enemies in its path. This ability can initiate team fights or turn the tide in Ornn's favor, making him a formidable force in both offensive and defensive situations.

However, Ornn does have his weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he lacks mobility and can struggle against champions with high burst damage. Additionally, his abilities have relatively long cooldowns, requiring careful management to maximize his effectiveness in prolonged engagements.

Ornn in the Game

In League of Legends, Ornn is primarily played in the top lane as a tank. His ability to sustain damage and disrupt the enemy team makes him an excellent frontline champion. He excels in team fights, where his crowd control abilities can turn the tide of battle in his team's favor.

Ornn's playstyle revolves around careful positioning and timing. His abilities require precise aim and coordination with his team to fully utilize his crowd control potential. Communication and teamwork are key when playing Ornn, as his ultimate ability can set up devastating combos with his allies.

As a tank, Ornn's role is to protect his team's carries and initiate fights. His durability allows him to soak up damage while his crowd control abilities keep enemies at bay. Additionally, his passive ability to upgrade items can provide a significant power spike for his team, making him a valuable asset in the late game.

Explore Ornn's Skins

On our website, you can find detailed information and videos showcasing all of Ornn's skins. From the fiery Thunder Lord Ornn to the icy Elderwood Ornn, each skin offers a unique visual and thematic experience. Whether you prefer the raw power of the base skin or the mystical allure of his alternate appearances, our page has you covered.

Discover the different skins and immerse yourself in the world of Ornn, the Fire Below the Mountain.

Ornn (Default)

RP Cost: N/A

Release Date: N/A

Ornn, the Fire below the Mountain, is a powerful and ancient demigod in the world of League of Legends. As one of the game's tanky top laners, Ornn possesses incredible strength and durability, making him a formidable force on the battlefield. While Ornn has several skins that offer unique visual and thematic changes, his default skin is the one that represents his true essence and character.

The default skin for Ornn showcases his rugged and imposing appearance. He is depicted as a massive, horned creature with fiery eyes and a body covered in molten rock and metal. His muscular physique and imposing stature make it clear that he is a force to be reckoned with. The intricate details of his armor and weapons, such as his massive hammer and fiery forge, further emphasize his role as a blacksmith and master craftsman.

Ornn's default skin perfectly captures his lore and backstory. In the world of Runeterra, Ornn is known as the Freljordian demigod of forging and craftsmanship. He is responsible for creating some of the most powerful and legendary weapons in the game, including the likes of Infinity Edge and Rabadon's Deathcap. His default skin reflects his connection to the elements of fire and earth, as well as his role as a guardian of the Freljord.

In terms of gameplay, Ornn's default skin does not offer any additional effects or animations compared to his other skins. However, it is the skin that players first encounter when they choose to play as Ornn, and it serves as a representation of his core identity and abilities. With his default skin, players can experience the full might and power of Ornn as they charge into battle, unleashing devastating abilities and tanking massive amounts of damage.

Ornn's Story and Abilities

Ornn's story within the League of Legends universe is one of ancient power and unwavering determination. As a demigod, he has existed for countless centuries, dedicating his life to the art of blacksmithing and the creation of legendary weapons. Ornn resides in the volcanic region of the Freljord, where he tirelessly hammers away at his forge, shaping the very fabric of the world.

In battle, Ornn is a formidable tank and initiator. His abilities allow him to disrupt enemy formations, soak up damage, and provide crowd control for his team. His passive ability, Living Forge, allows him to upgrade his own items and those of his teammates, granting them additional stats and effects. This unique ability sets Ornn apart from other champions and makes him a valuable asset in team fights.

Ornn's Q ability, Volcanic Rupture, causes the ground to erupt in a line, damaging and slowing enemies caught in its path. His W ability, Bellows Breath, grants him a temporary shield and deals damage to enemies in a cone in front of him. His E ability, Searing Charge, allows him to dash forward, damaging and knocking up enemies in his path. Finally, his ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, summons a massive elemental ram that charges forward, knocking up enemies and creating opportunities for his team to engage.

While Ornn possesses incredible strength and durability, he does have some weaknesses. His early game can be challenging, as he relies on scaling and item upgrades to reach his full potential. Additionally, his lack of mobility makes him susceptible to kiting and crowd control effects. However, in the hands of a skilled player, Ornn can become an unstoppable force, leading his team to victory with his powerful initiation and crowd control abilities.

Explore Ornn's Appearances

If you want to learn more about Ornn and his various appearances in the League of Legends game, you can find detailed information and videos on this page. Whether you're interested in his other skins, such as Thunder Lord Ornn or Elderwood Ornn, or want to delve deeper into his lore and backstory, this page is your ultimate resource for all things Ornn. Discover the power of the Fire below the Mountain and unleash the fury of the Freljord with Ornn and his default skin.

Ornn (Thunder Lord Ornn)

RP Cost: 1350 RP

Release Date: August 2, 2018

The Thunder Lord Ornn skin is a visually stunning and thematically fitting addition to the League of Legends universe. This skin transforms the already formidable blacksmith demigod into a fearsome deity of thunder and lightning. With its intricate design and electrifying effects, Thunder Lord Ornn is a must-have for any Ornn enthusiast or collector of epic skins.

The Thunder Lord Ornn skin is priced at 1350 RP, making it a mid-tier skin in terms of cost. It offers a significant visual upgrade to the base Ornn skin, with new particle effects, animations, and sound effects that truly bring the thunder to the battlefield. Released on August 2, 2018, this skin has been a popular choice among players who want to showcase their mastery of Ornn in style.

Thunder Lord Ornn: A Closer Look

The Thunder Lord Ornn skin takes inspiration from the powerful thunder gods of various mythologies. Ornn himself is transformed into a towering figure wreathed in storm clouds, crackling with electricity. His armor is adorned with lightning motifs, and his hammer is infused with the power of thunder. Every ability and attack is accompanied by thunderous sound effects and dazzling visual effects, making Thunder Lord Ornn a truly awe-inspiring sight on the battlefield.

One of the standout features of the Thunder Lord Ornn skin is the unique animations and particle effects. When Ornn uses his abilities, bolts of lightning strike the ground, leaving behind scorched earth. His ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God, summons a massive lightning bolt from the sky, crashing down on his enemies with devastating force. These effects not only make Thunder Lord Ornn visually impressive but also enhance the gameplay experience, making it easier to track Ornn's abilities in the heat of battle.

In addition to the stunning visual effects, Thunder Lord Ornn also boasts new voice lines that further enhance the thematic elements of the skin. Ornn's voice takes on a more commanding and godlike tone, befitting his new thunder deity persona. These voice lines add an extra layer of immersion and make playing Thunder Lord Ornn a truly epic experience.

The Story of Ornn

Ornn, also known as the Fire Below the Mountain, is a powerful demigod and one of the Freljord's most ancient beings. He is a stoic and solitary figure, dedicated to his craft as a blacksmith and protector of the Freljord. Ornn's abilities as a blacksmith are legendary, and he is capable of forging weapons and items of immense power.

In the game, Ornn is a tanky top laner who excels at initiating team fights and disrupting the enemy team. His passive ability, Living Forge, allows him to upgrade his own items and those of his teammates, granting them additional stats and unique effects. Ornn's abilities revolve around his hammer, which he uses to unleash devastating attacks and control the battlefield.

Ornn's strengths lie in his ability to soak up damage and initiate fights with his ultimate ability, Call of the Forge God. This ability allows him to summon a massive ram that charges forward, knocking up and damaging enemies in its path. Ornn's crowd control abilities, such as his W ability, Bellows Breath, and his E ability, Searing Charge, make him a formidable presence in team fights, capable of disrupting the enemy team and protecting his allies.

However, Ornn does have weaknesses that players must be aware of. His early game can be challenging, as he lacks mobility and can struggle against aggressive laners. Ornn's abilities also have relatively long cooldowns, making it crucial for players to time their engages and disengages effectively. Additionally, Ornn's passive ability requires him to return to base to upgrade items, which can leave him vulnerable if not managed properly.

Despite these weaknesses, Ornn's unique playstyle and powerful abilities make him a valuable asset to any team. His ability to upgrade items for himself and his teammates can provide a significant advantage in the late game, and his crowd control abilities make him a force to be reckoned with in team fights. With Thunder Lord Ornn, players can now showcase their mastery of this powerful demigod in a visually stunning and thematically fitting skin.

For more information about Ornn and his various appearances, including Thunder Lord Ornn, be sure to check out the League of Legends website and official YouTube channel. Explore the rich lore and gameplay of this iconic champion and discover the many ways you can dominate the battlefield as Ornn, the Fire Below the Mountain.
